column1: We do a lot of important work here at Brex Corp.
You help the company with your work. A very important part of the machine.
Packages are sent from many factories, to the outer borders of the city.
Do they not look so pleasing? Something you would like in your home too?
Something you would like to handle every day?
Something you would let your children hold?
Ah, but the children. So small. They grow quickly but their hard work never seems to last.
Perhaps it is because the children do not get to be children.
